name: Fleet Systems Inc
description: Led the development of software and websites (eCommerce, corporate, social) and managed IT projects, ensuring timely delivery and high standards. Oversaw API development, database management, and integrated services like PayPal. Key projects include Salatty.com (online grocery store), Click to Taxi (taxi booking platform), and Special Car (transportation service platform). Utilized technologies such as PHP, Laravel, Yii, MySQL, Git, Payment APIs (PayPal), and Amazon Web Services (AWS).
